sn35.60:0.3: The Complete Understanding of All Grasping
sn35.60:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping.
sn35.60:1.3: And what is the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping?
sn35.60:1.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.60:1.5: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.60:1.6: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, and feeling.
sn35.60:1.7: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely understood grasping.’
sn35.60:1.8: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. …
sn35.60:1.9: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn35.60:1.10: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn35.60:1.11: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn35.60:1.12: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.60:1.13: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.60:1.14: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple grows disillusioned with the mind, thoughts, mind consciousness, mind contact, and feeling.
sn35.60:1.15: Being disillusioned, desire fades away. When desire fades away they’re freed. When they are released, they understand: ‘I have completely understood grasping.’
sn35.60:1.16: This is the principle for the complete understanding of all grasping.”
